請send email俾呢位Van Hollen, 由Luke加拎持嘅template如下:
assistance@vanhollen.senate.gov

Dear Sen. Van Hollen,

Hello! I am a Hong Konger writing to implore you to support Sen. Hawley's bi-partisan Resolution, calling for the Congress to stand with Hong Kong. For a year we have been living in fear of and struggling against the Chinese Communist regime, who has now stripped Hong Kong's autonomy completely with the proposal of the sham national security law. It is written deliberately vaguely to persecute anyone who dares speak against the government.

The brutal treatment Hong Kongers have been subjected to, especially in the past year, has been clear to the world. Freedom, human rights and liberty, what Americans take as self-evident, is what we are defending and fighting for.

Hong Kong is grateful for the support of many American congressmen and statesmen. We would be grateful and honoured to have yours too!

quote.msg:
請send email俾呢位Van Hollen, 由Luke加拎持嘅template如下:
assistance@vanhollen.senate.gov

Dear Sen. Van Hollen,

Hello! I am a Hong Konger writing to implore you to support Sen. Hawley's bi-partisan Resolution, calling for the Congress to stand with Hong Kong. For a year we have been living in fear of and struggling against the Chinese Communist regime, who has now stripped Hong Kong's autonomy completely with the proposal of the sham national security law. It is written deliberately vaguely to persecute anyone who dares speak against the government.

The brutal treatment Hong Kongers have been subjected to, especially in the past year, has been clear to the world. Freedom, human rights and liberty, what Americans take as self-evident, is what we are defending and fighting for.

Hong Kong is grateful for the support of many American congressmen and statesmen. We would be grateful and honoured to have yours too!
有手足求email title
